metadata.title: Oikion - Operating System for Greek Real Estate Agencies
metadata.description: Complete MLS, CRM, and activity feed solution for real estate agencies in Greece. Manage properties, clients, and team collaboration in one platform.

hero.title: Operating System for
hero.description: Complete MLS, CRM, and internal activity feed. Manage properties, clients, and team collaboration in one powerful platform designed for Greek real estate professionals.

features.label: Features
features.title: Everything you need to run your agency
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed specifically for Greek real estate professionals to manage properties, clients, and team collaboration.

mls.title: Complete MLS System
mls.description: Manage your property listings with a comprehensive Multiple Listing System. Fast CRUD operations, advanced filters, and media management.

crm.title: Built-in CRM
crm.description: Track clients, interactions, and tasks in one place. Manage your relationships and never miss a follow-up.

activity.title: Activity Feed
activity.description: Stay informed with an internal activity feed showing all significant events across your organization.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Work together seamlessly with role-based access control and real-time updates for your entire team.

billing.title: Subscription Billing
billing.description: Transparent pricing with Stripe-powered subscription management and customer portal.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: Built with modern security practices, Auth.js v5 authentication, and hosted on reliable infrastructure.

section1.title: Empower your agency
section1.description: Unlock the full potential of your real estate business with Oikion. Manage properties, collaborate seamlessly with your team, and scale your operations effortlessly.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: Work together with your team members in real-time with shared property listings and client data.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: Streamline your workflows with integrated MLS, CRM, and activity tracking in one platform.

scalable.title: Scalable
scalable.description: Our platform offers the scalability needed to grow from a small team to a large agency.

section2.title: Seamless workflow integration
section2.description: Integrate Oikion seamlessly into your existing real estate workflows. Connect your property data, client information, and team activities in one unified system.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.description: Customize your property fields, client tags, and workflows to fit your unique agency requirements.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: Streamline your processes with automated activity tracking and reducing manual data entry.

reliable.title: Reliable
reliable.description: Rely on our robust infrastructure with PostgreSQL database and comprehensive documentation.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: See how real estate agencies are using Oikion to transform their business.

user1.name: Maria Papadopoulos
user1.review: Oikion has revolutionized how we manage our property listings and client relationships. Everything we need is in one place, and our team collaboration has never been better.

user2.name: Nikos Dimitriou
user2.review: The MLS system is incredibly intuitive and the activity feed keeps me updated on everything happening in our agency. It's a game changer for our business.

user3.name: Elena Georgiadou
user3.review: Managing our team and tracking client interactions has become so much easier with Oikion. The CRM features are exactly what we needed.

preview.description: Experience the power of a complete real estate operating system. Manage properties, clients, and your team all from one beautiful dashboard.
